title: GE Profile 30" Gas Cooktop - PGP7030SLSS
description:
GE Profile 30" Stainless Steel Gas Cooktop - PGP7030SLSS

Features:

Fit Guarantee 
Replacing a similar cooktop from GE or another brand? GE cooktops are guaranteed for an exact fit to make replacement easy

30" cooktop with 5 burners 
Enjoy ultimate cooktop flexibility and more cooking space with 5 sealed burners

Heavy-cast, edge-to-edge grates 
Allow for easy movement of pans between burners

18,000 BTU Power Boil burner 
Boil water fast with intense heat from this 18,000 BTU burner

White LED backlit heavy-duty knobs 
Durable knobs are back-lit with white LED lighting that lend a sleek appearance and let you know if burners are on

Precise Simmer burner 
Delicate foods don't burn with low, even heat

Sealed cooktop burners 
Contains spills and make cleaning quick and easy



Specifications:

General

Burner - Center: 18,000 BTU Power Boil

Cooktop Surface: Deep Porcelain-Enamel. Black

Valves (Degree of Turn): 270

Burner - Right Front: 12,000 BTU

Burner - Left Rear: 9,500 BTU

Control Location: Front Center

Griddle: JXGRIDL230. Cast Iron. Optional

Ignition System: Electronic

Cooktop Burner Grate Material: Medium Cast

Fuel Type: Natural Gas (factory set)

Burner - Left Front: 9,500 BTU

Cooktop Burner Type: 5 Sealed

Control Type: Knob

Burner - Right Rear: 5,000 BTU

Cooktop Burner Grate Features: Continuous Grates. Dishwasher Safe. Edge-to-Edge Grates



Filter

App Filter - Control Type: Rotary knobs

App Filter - Fuel Type: Gas

App Filter - Cabinet Width: Cooking 30 in. (Standard)

App Filter - Cooktop Type: Continuous Grates



Appearance

Control Knobs: Stainless Steel Appearance. Dishwasher Safe. White LED Backlit

Cooktop Burner Grate Color: Matte Black

Color Appearance: Stainless Steel



Power / Ratings

Volts/Hertz/Amps: 120V; 60Hz; 5A

Burner BTU Ratings (000's/BTU) - LP Gas: (1) 18.0; (1) 12.0; (2) 9.5; (1) 5.0

Burner BTU Ratings (000's/BTU) - Natural Gas: (1) 18.0; (1) 12.0; (2) 9.5; (1) 5.0



Accessories

LP Conversion Kit: Included



Approximate Dimensions:

Height: 5-1/2"

Width: 30"

Depth: 21"

Cabinet Width: 30"

Cutout (W x D): 28-1/2" x 19-5/8"



Approximate Weight:

Unit: 44 lbs

Shipping: 50 lbs


Warranty Information:

Manufacturer Warranty (authorized online retailer): One Year Parts and Labor
